function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited financial resources and low access to comprehensive health care in LMICs","Impact":"Obstacles to implementing psychosocial and economic interventions for COVID-19","Mitigation":"Increase funding for comprehensive health care and address socio-cultural factors","Technologies":"Telemedicine and telepsychology","People":"Vulnerable populations in LMICs","Owner":"Governments and international organizations"},{"Description":"Limited access to comprehensive information due to language and search engine restrictions","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of implemented interventions for COVID-19 psychosocial and economic consequences","Mitigation":"Expand language coverage and use a wider range of scientific search engines","Technologies":"Language translation tools, diverse search engines","People":"Researchers and policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions and international organizations"},{"Description":"Uncertainty and unpredictability of the future of the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Challenges in planning and response to the pandemic's trends","Mitigation":"Develop flexible and adaptive response strategies, invest in public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Data analytics, predictive modeling","People":"Governments and public health authorities","Owner":"Governments and public health authorities"}]}
